nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Grievous Attacks! is a young readers book based on three episodes of Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series. It features General Grievous in three episodes: Rookies (adapted by Veronica Wasserman), Downfall of a Droid (With Duel of the Droids) (adapted by Tracey West), and Lair of Grievous (adapted by Rob Valois). It was first published by Grosset & Dunlap on February 5, 2009 in paperback.
"I will rest when the Jedi are dead." —General Grievous

One of the most fearsome enemies of the Galactic Republic, General Grievous, has made it his sole duty to hunt down and destroy every last Jedi. In this trilogy of stories, a group of young clone soldiers goes up against Grievous's droid army, the general captures R2-D2, and finally the Jedi find themselves trapped inside Grievous's evil lair. Be careful, you never know what will happen when Grievous Attacks!
This is a gallery of different cover variations of Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Grievous Attacks!.
